Topic.Title: Where to host a sound file and count its downloads?

Posts.EditableText:
I want to be able to tell how many people have completed my game. One idea to do this is to play a sound file when the game ends and host that file somewhere and then see how many times it's been downloaded.

1) Is this a sensible idea?
2) Where could I host it so I can count downloads?

Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: You could possibly provide a link at  the end of a game to a web page and count how many times that page is visited.  Seems kind of "bush" league, but it would work.
